content.rendered:
A Glimpse From Past

We've Created it into Reality

YASYA, Stist’s very own inter college cultural festival. The music, the lights, the memories that we make during Yasya will be the one to stay with us when we look back at our college life. The programs of Yasya were all very successful events. We have had famous performers like DJ Siana Kathrine, The Thaikudam Bridge, Gowri Lekshmi perform on our stage.

The success of an event like yasya is the collective effort of each and every one. Hope everyone will be with us for the Success of Yasya ’22 too.

Watch Yasya 21

Thaikkudam Bridge

Yasya ’19

Gowri Lakshmi

Yasya ’19

Yasya ’19

Since 2014 we’ve been into creating an Event for the Whole Student commodity to Dance off to

Events

8th

Edition

Yasya ’22 preparing to be the Eighth edition is going to be fully packed.

50+

Programs Conducted

With a total of over 50 Intercollege events conducted.

150+

Prizes Given

More than 150 prizes were distributed on behalf of Yasya.

3500

Students

More than 3500 Students attended our events over the last few years

2014

EXODIA 2K14

Started as EXODIA in 2014 as college arts, and it wasn’t quite from from where our destination was.

2015

YASYA 2K15

The name Yasya became an identity from 2015 with intra college events.

2016

YASYA ’16

Letting it Rise to a new heights year by year brought Yasya to what it is now.

2017

YASYA ’17

SLAVNOST NALADA – The festival of festivals was here. started hosting intercollege events and pro shows took it up to a whole new level.

2018

YASYA ’18

Yasya ’18 came up with redesigning its logo and symbolizing its identity among others. And the tagline EMBRASE THE EXPERIENCE says it all.

2019

YASYA ’19

Gold is the symbol of luxury and changing the logo to gold made it more luxurious. Hosting one of the best cultural fests from Trivandrum it gained the attention of all through the Thaikkudam and Gowry Lekshmi.

2020

YASYA ’20

Yasya 2020 was planned to be an Epic celebration of events and programs to let the crowd go wow. All of our hopes were broken. Unexpectedly we missed an epic due to COVID 19.

2021

YASYA ’21

ENGULFED IN LUMINANCE We at Yasya are here to spread the light of hope to each and everyone to overcome from this pandemic world. #staysafe #wearmask

2022

Yasya '22

Together We Define

Manifests the magic lying dormant in every individual and empowers them to harness the magic using tenacity’s wand…
Rise and shine ⭐✨ because the moment is all yours. You and you alone, are destined to be the leader world craves for…
